myriad 0.3.0.9000
  • Reference

Import all Myriad Pro font faces and styles for use in graphs as "Myriad Pro".

import_myriad.Rd

This will work for devices that use `systemfonts` to process fonts. For PDFs, use showtext::showtext_auto() beforehand

Usage

import_myriad(family = "Myriad Pro", silent = TRUE)

Arguments

family

The font family you want to import

silent

Report on what's been imported or not

Note

From https://yjunechoe.github.io/posts/2021-06-24-setting-up-and-debugging-custom-fonts/.
